Package visualisation

Enum ColorGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ColorGradient>
      • visualisation.ColorGradient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ColorGradient>
    public enum ColorGradient
extends Enum<ColorGradient>
    Color Gradient for generating RGB values for double values between 0 and 1.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      FIRE
      Red dominant color gradient: black - red - orange - yellow - white.
      RAINBOW
      Gradient at the outer edge of the color circle.

    • Constructor Summary

      private ColorGradient()

      • applyUnbounded

        protected abstract int applyUnbounded​(double value)
        Internal abstract function for applying colors to normalized values between 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        value - must be between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        RGB value as int (0 - 0xFFFFFF)

      • apply

        public final int apply​(double value)
        Clipping value to range between 0 and 1 and applying RGB gradient transformation.
        Parameters:
        value - the double value to get the RGB value for
        Returns:
        RGB value as int (0 - 0xFFFFFF)
